entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
